thread.section_title: Trade Tested Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Trade Tested | www.tradetested.co.nz
thread.title: Carol Houghton
thread.title_full: Trade Tested reviewed by Carol Houghton

author: Carol Houghton
title: Carol Houghton
text: I was extremely impressed with the fast efficient service from Trade Tested when I purchased a Chooketeria. The product was well packed and came with good assembly instructions and a very helpful video to view online. This company is really on the ball and a pleasure to deal with.
